name: You are The Striker
description:
Relive the thrills of being a superstar soccer striker.

Every field is yours to tame.
Each ball has only one destiny.
You will become The Striker!
You will score every goal!

I've started building this as a way of exploring https://www.puzzlescript.net/.

I'm hoping to build some more puzzling fields, and play with the player scripting. Releasing now as it is quite fun as it is.
